name: SWGAide
tagline: Your aide in Star Wars Galaxies, the stellar role playing game
body:
### Welcome to SWGAide.
This is a fork of the original SWGAide project by Zimoon located at [https://sites.google.com/site/simongronlund/swgaide](https://sites.google.com/site/simongronlund/swgaide). This fork aims to enhance the original project with support for user-run servers as well as other enhancements as deemed fit.

### First time installation
* Go to [Releases](https://github.com/Sobuno/SWGAide/releases) and download either SWGAide.exe (Recommended) or SWGAide.jar
* Create a new folder for SWGAide
* Drop the downloaded file into the new folder
* Create a shortcut at your desktop for the file
* Launch SWGAide by double-clicking its icon -- see below on Windows 8/7/Vista.
* Follow the instructions: chiefly that is to help SWGAide find the location of SWG.

### Update instructions
* Download the new zip-file.
* Optionally move the old JAR file to for example "backups".
* In "backups", if SWGAide.bak is old: copy the SWGAide.DAT file to somewhere.
* Put the new JAR file in the place of the old one.
* Launch SWGAide as usual.

### Misc :
* Windows 8, 7 & Vista
carefully read the read-me file about administrative and security settings.

* Help, Information, and FAQ: 
    * Press F1 or the Help menu for help on the current window.
    * After first launch of SWGAide, find a index.html file.

* Support forum:  [SWGAide at The SWGCraft Project](http://www.swgcraft.org/forums/viewforum.php?f=43).
* System requirements: Java JRE v. 6 -- http://java.com 

### DOWNLOAD:
Always retain at least one exe/JAR file as backup.
Latest release available here: https://github.com/Sobuno/SWGAide/releases
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
